explains: v. 改变，修正；修改，修订（书刊、估算等）；<英>温习，复习
n. 修订，校订；（印刷）改样
wordGroup: revise for v. 复习功课（迎考）

sentences.en: I can't come out tonight. I have to revise.
sentences.cn: 我今晚不能出去。我得复习。

sentences.en: With time he came to revise his opinion of the profession.
sentences.cn: 随着时间的推移，他开始修正自己对这一职业的看法。

sentences.en: Revise the draft to improve its content.
